Package de.dfki.lt.mary.htsengine

Class Summary
GVModelSet Set of Global Mean and (diagonal) Variance for log f0, mel-cepstrum, bandpass voicing strengths and Fourier magnitudes (the signal processing part of Fourier magnitudes is not implemented yet).
HMMData Configuration files and global variables for HTS engine.
HMMVoice  
HTSDWin Windows used to calculate dynamic features, delta and delta-delta.
HTSModel HMM model for a particular phoneme (or line in context feature file) This model is the unit when building a utterance model sequence.
HTSModelSet Set of all HMM pdfs models for duration, log f0, mel-cepstrum, bandpass voicing strengths and Fourier magnitudes (the signal processing part of Fourier magnitudes is not implemented yet).
HTSNode Node of a tree.
HTSParameterGeneration Parameter generation out of trained HMMs.
HTSPStream Data type and procedures used in parameter generation.
HTSQuestion The question class contains a name of the question and its patterns.
HTSTree Decision trees.
HTSTreeSet Tree set containing trees and questions lists for DUR, logF0, MCP, STR and MAG Java port and extension of HTS engine version 2.0 Extension: mixed excitation
HTSUttModel list of Model objects for current utterance.
HTSVocoder Synthesis of speech out of speech parameters.
SlideVector Slide Vector is a Vector that can be used with different offsets.
